resources.string: Tablet storage full,the application has been stopped. Please free space and try again.
Tablet storage full,the process has been stopped. Please free space and try again.
The tablet storage does not have enough space. Please release some storage or insert a SD card.
The tablet storage does not have enough space. Please release some storage or change the default write disk in the settings.
Device storage is full, please delete useless files, otherwise application might exit unexpectedly
